879780.name: The Factory Must Survive
879780.description:
The Factory Must Survive, formerly the Strive for Infinity project started in early 2018, is an ambitious strategy set in a dystopian future during the galactic war of attrition waged between the Rogue Megacorporations and the Empire spanning thousands of worlds.

Play as the first artificial general intelligence, the Machine, the ultimate invention of mankind. Establish an autonomous factory of the rising Megacorporation. Command the resources of an entire star cluster through automation on an unprecedented scale. Supply the galactic warfront with heaps of military hardware and resources or ship medical supplies offworld to reduce war tensions. Outproduce the Empire to turn the tide in a war of attrition. Will the ends justify the means? Do you dare to start producing weapons of mass destruction?

Key features planned for the Early Access:
  • Conveyor-less factory desing for optimization reasons to aim for an unprecedented scale
  • Simulation of a single solar system having multiple playable voxel planets
  • Procedural generation of planetary surfaces, space encounters and solar systems
  • Factory building on a multi-planetary scale including combat units production
  • Resource management, interplanetary supply lines, space battles, space stations
  • Optional storyline revealed during the game with a single ending
  • Cooperative multiplayer and player hosted dedicated servers!
  • Space exploration, automation, megastructures and more!

The Factory Must Grow
The Factory Must Survive
879780.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
